info.title: uDo Platform API
info.description: The uDo REST API lets you interact with uDo platform from frontend to backend via sending an HTTP request. uDo is a cloud-based app platform. Its purpose is to connect local service providers (both contents, and APIs) to the end users through the smart end devices, such as kiosk, ipad, smart phones, game consoles, smart tv, and smart watch, etc.
